

```{r, echo=F}
library(slickR)
imgs <- c("img/The_places_where_magic_bears_live.jpg",
          "img/Sunbombland.JPG"
          )
slickR(obj=imgs, 
       slideId="t1",
       height="450px",width="100%",
       slickOpts=list(  dots= T,
                        infinite= T,
                        speed= 300,
                        slidesToShow= 1,
                        centerMode=F))
```
